dmca.title: [ADMINS] Illegal use of your hosting services
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:
 
Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").
 
Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.
 
Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
 
 
From: English Made in Brazil [emb@sk.com.br]
Sent: Friday, December 15, 2006 9:01 AM
To: Admins
Cc: huback@isbrasil.info; coiote@coiote.net
Subject: [ADMINS] Illegal use of your hosting services
 
Dear Sir,
You are hosting a Brazilian website ( WWW.ESTUDENET.COM <http://www.estudenet.com/>
) that has plagiarized 12 pages from WWW.SK.COM.BR <http://www.sk.com.br/> , whose
author is Prof. Ricardo Sch
dmca.principal_name: Breno Eduardo Kaercher (For Prof. Ricardo Sch
